list.abs: but dressing immodestly hinders the possibilities for true love to develop , for it draws attention to her sexual values to such an extent that it overshadows her value as a person .但不得体的衣着会阻碍这种真爱的产生，因为它将男性的眼光都吸引到她的“性价值”那里，而她作为一个人的价值却被遮蔽。
